resources.string: Permission to block screen not granted. Exiting.
This app allows you to limit the time and frequency of use of your mobile device, blocking it completely.
Set the following parameters and protect your time and your mind. Don\'t become a subject of performance.
The app uses a time bucket to know when to block the phone. The bucket has the size of your max continuous session.
When you use your phone, the bucket drains, and when you don\'t use it, it fills. The drain and fill rates are determined by your target time.
If you want to use your phone 2 hours a day, then the fill rate is 11 times less than the drain rate, so for every 11 minutes of rest time, you will get 1 minute of use time.
When you empty the bucket, the phone will block for a period of time such that the bucket is half full.
